attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the failure of the Prime Minister to dissolve the Rotten Parliament and to support the removal of the Speaker in these extraordinary circumstances, action should be taken by the one remaining person with the constitutional authority to dissolve Parliament, the Queen.  I would argue that it is the duty of the Queen to step in and protect democracy.  In 1653 Cromwell acted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
